title: SOLD: 1909 Pittsburgh Pirates and S&H Green Stamps "Two Champions" Advertising PC
author: asoriano

posts.post_title: SOLD: 1909 Pittsburgh Pirates and S&H Green Stamps "Two Champions" Advertising PC
posts.post_content:
Exceptionally rare postcard featuring portrait images from famed photographer Carl Horner. Never been mailed with an overprint on the reverse printed in black ink. EX condition. 

[S]$1250 DLVD[/S]
[S]$1000 DLVD[/S]
$750 DLVD SOLD
